The `selectFactoryPage` method is intended for switching between different configuration pages related to particle factories, allowing users to adjust settings based on selected options.

Context:
This code chunk pertains to the setup and orientation management of a particle system in a Panda3D-based application, specifically handling the factory selection and overall system orientation.

def setSystemHpr(self, pos):
        self.particles.nodePath.setHpr(Vec3(pos[0], pos[1], pos[2]))
